EmailTemplate.name: D&S Comms.D&S LTS101 Customer Survey and Replay 09.08.2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace LTS101 Webcast Survey and Replay
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Title Dear Customer,
Thank you for your participation in the Honeywell LTS101 Technical webcast.
If you were unable to attend the webcast and would like to hear a playback recording of the full meeting, please access the online recording by clicking the following link: http://budurl.me/LTS101Update20150901.
We would like your feedback about regarding technical support over the past 12 months as well as the 2015 Webcast. Please click on this link https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/23VK9TB <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/23VK9TB> to submit your comments. Your input will help us improve our future communications.
Thank you, Lori Cartledge Customer Support Manager Honeywell Aerospace Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2013 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
